name: Zivo Bioscience, Inc.
description: Zivo Bioscience, Inc. is a biotechnology company focused on the development and commercialization of health and wellness products derived from its proprietary algal technology. Founded in 2010, Zivo aims to harness the power of microalgae to create sustainable products that promote human health and wellness. The company is dedicated to advancing innovative solutions in the nutraceutical and functional food sectors, leveraging its unique algal strains and research capabilities. Zivo's flagship product line includes high-quality, plant-based ingredients that are rich in essential nutrients and bioactive compounds. Their algal extracts have applications in dietary supplements, cosmetics, and food products, positioning Zivo at the forefront of the growing demand for natural and sustainable alternatives in the health market. The company's research and development efforts focus on optimizing algal cultivation techniques and enhancing the bioavailability of the beneficial compounds in their products. As part of its commitment to sustainability, Zivo prioritizes environmentally-friendly practices in its operations, contributing to the reduction of carbon footprints while promoting health through natural products. With a vision to lead in the sustainable health sector, Zivo Bioscience continues to expand its product offerings and partnerships within the health and wellness industries.

seo.meta_title: Zivo Bioscience, Inc. | Algal-Based Health Solutions
seo.meta_description: Explore Zivo Bioscience, Inc., a leader in algal biotechnology dedicated to creating health and wellness products from sustainable sources. Discover our innovative solutions.

faq.question: What does Zivo Bioscience specialize in?
faq.answer: Zivo Bioscience specializes in developing health and wellness products derived from microalgae.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Zivo Bioscience?
faq.answer: John D. F. McMahon is the CEO of Zivo Bioscience, Inc.

faq.question: Where is Zivo Bioscience headquartered?
faq.answer: Zivo Bioscience is headquartered in Farmington Hills, Michigan, USA.

faq.question: What types of products does Zivo offer?
faq.answer: Zivo offers algal supplements, functional ingredients, and plant-based nutrients.
